description.narrative: Funding under this initiative provides support to key non-government organisations, specifically: Oxfam's Refugees for Realities project which aims to raise public awareness and understanding of the causes of refugee flight, the impacts of conflict and the nature of humanitarian crisis; Caritas's Blueprint for a Better World- MDGs and You a multimedia touring exhibition gives a practical face to the eight MDGs; and the Hamlin Fistula Lighting a Candle project which aims to raise public awareness about the problem of Obstetric Fistula in developing countries; the work of the Fistula Hospital; and the UN Millennium Development goals through a broadcast documentary for Australian and international audiences. The total value of this initiative is $0.8 million over 3 years, starting 2008-09.
